title.text: RUSLAN -AN NT SYSTEM BETWEEN CLOSELY RELATED LANGUAGES

entities.text: RUSLAN -AN NT SYSTEM BETWEEN CLOSELY RELATED LANGUAGES

abstractContent.text: A project of machine translation of Czech computer manuals into Russian is described, presenting first a description of the overall system structure and concentrating then mainly on input text preparation and a parsing algorithm based on bottom-up parser programmed in Colmerauer's Q-systems.

entities.text: machine translation of Czech computer manuals
